metadata.title: CVE-2010-4001 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** GMXRC.bash in Gromacs 4.5.1 and earlier places a zero-lengthdirectory name in the LD_LIBRARY_PATH, which allows local users to gainprivileges via a Trojan horse shared library in the current workingdirectory.  NOTE: CVE disputes this issue because the GMXLDLIB value isalways added to the beginning of LD_LIBRARY_PATH at a later point in thescript.

criterions.comment: gromacs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
